Original:
12/16這天因為我老公說要球隊聚餐，就也沒想這麼多甚至約18:30，然後因為路上有點塞車，我們到的時候也差不多快要七點了!!!當時進去微醺其實是帶著有點抱歉的心情，也不太敢看其他球員，哈哈因為我們遲到~後來就坐下跟朋友一起聊天的同時，我有個朋友是一位媽媽 平時不太喜歡麻煩別人，他就請我陪她一起去車上拿小孩的褲子，因為小孩子的褲子尿濕了~我原本想說我才剛到怎麼可以這麼快又要出門而且停車場離超遠，我還先拒絕~這位媽媽又問我另個朋友，也被拒絕~我就想說好啦~我就陪她去一下好了~我們拿完褲子之後要回去~回到微醺的時候我有發現異樣就外面的不認識散客在看我哈哈 後來發現奇怪窗簾怎麼拉下來了~~~結果一進門大家都站了兩排，拿著氣球 撒著花瓣 還有拿著gopro在拍照都有!然後就看著我跟林祖傑在一起15年點點滴滴的回顧影片，心裡想著有點可怕!!!大家可能都快忘了林祖傑瘦的時候是長甚麼樣子~後來林祖傑就拿著麥克風出來真情告白了一下，因為我跟他說過我不喜歡鑽戒，本身就不太愛戴戒指的~然後他沒送我戒指，送我iphone13!!整個尖叫了一下!!!哈哈 這比看到戒指還開心~謝謝微醺為我們準備的料理以及非常有氣氛的環境!!我家人也有從桃園一起下來台南~他們也說那裏的環境非常的美也很舒服~重點在那天還無意間拍到了流星~

微醺有提供影片播放、麥克風設備、蠻適合溫馨的小求婚場地，外面也有美麗的風景~氣氛真的很不錯!!!適合想要精緻又低調的小求婚啦~而且不用去想設備要怎麼租借等等…。

只是美中不足的地方是供餐的量不太足~我家人也吃不太飽~我自己也是!出餐速度也是有段時間!!!但是提供的自製酒~很好喝!家人還打包回去桃園~
EN:
12/16 This day, because my husband said that he wanted the team to dinner, I didn't think so much or even about 18:30, and then because there was a traffic jam on the road, it was almost seven o'clock when we arrived! I have a sorry mood, and I don't dare to watch other players. Haha because we are late ~ Later, I sat down and chatted with my friends. I have a friend who is a mother who usually doesn't like to bother others. He invites me to ask me. Go to the car with her to get the child's pants, because the children’s pants are wet ~ I originally wanted to say how I just got out of the house and the parking lot was far away. I also rejected it. Ask me another friend, and I was rejected ~ I just want to say it ~ I will accompany her ~ After we take the pants, we have to go back ~ When I return to Weixi The guest was watching me, and then I found out how strange curtains were pulled down ~~~ As a result, everyone stood two rows when they entered the door, sprinkled the petals with a balloon, and took GOPRO to take pictures! Then I watched me and Lin Zujie are in Let's look back at the film for 15 years together, thinking a little terrible !!! Everyone may almost forget what Lin Zujie looks like when it is thin ~ Later After I don't like the diamond ring, I don't like to wear a ring in myself ~ Then he didn't send me the ring, I sent me iPhone13 !! The whole scream! Haha, this is more happy than seeing the ring ~ Thank you Weili for preparing for us The cuisine and very atmospheric environment !! My family also came down from Taoyuan to Tainan ~ They also said that the environment there was very beautiful and comfortable ~ The focus was on the meteor in accident ~

Weili has a video playback, microphone equipment, and it is quite suitable for a warm small proposal venue. There are also beautiful scenery outside ~ The atmosphere is really good !!! It is suitable for a small proposal that wants to be exquisite and low -key. Rent and wait ...

It ’s just that there are not enough meals in the United States and China ~ My family is not enough to eat ~ I am also! The speed of meals is also for a while !!! But the self -made wine provided ~ very delicious! The family also packed it back to Taoyuan to go back to Taoyuan. ~
